attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248758. Introducing the 2022 Mitsubishi Xpander 1.5 Auto, a multi-purpose vehicle with a modern exterior design and a more than spacious interior with three seating rows capable of transporting 7 individuals comfortably. This vehicle is acceptably stable for highway speeds and incredible for urban environments. Features include, tow-bar, multi-function steering wheel, front and rear electric windows, electrically adjustable side mirrors and rear Park Distance Control. The infotainment system is a colour touchscreen system sourced from Sony, it features a reverse camera, Bluetooth, USB as well as both Apple CarPlay and Android Auto functionality and is acceptably fast, relatively intuitive and has a good resolution. 
If you have any enquiries or would like to test drive this vehicle, please contact us and we will set up an appointment to suit your day.
